channel.title: What You'll Learn :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Code.org Quotes Video Script Finally, before embarking on this program, let’s take a brief minute to review what you’ll learn by the time you complete the program. Of course, the biggest and most impactful outcome will be learning how to write computer programs. Throughout the Computational Core program, you’ll learn either the Java or Python programming language, and get to a point where you are quite proficient with your language of choice.
